title: Reward for Helping
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Phew~. Nozomi-chan, I’m done with sweeping the fallen leaves over here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thanks, Honoka-chan. I’m almost done with my side too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, what will you do with these leaves?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Our shrine has a dump at the back, so we’ll collect it there<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>If you’re going to throw them away, can’t we put them to good use? Something like making baked potatoes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Baked potatoes, huh…. We might not have enough leaves to make baked potatoes, ah, how about baked apples?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>How do you make baked apples?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You remove the core of the apples and then stuff them with butter and cinnamon. Then you wrap them with aluminum foil and put it on the fire. It’ll be all runny and delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That sounds tasty~~~! Let’s make some baked apples, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, if we get more fallen leaves, let’s make baked potatoes too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
